descriptionHtml:
hello I made this to add some Sercurity to dawnstar because in the vanilla game this town seemed very unprotected and very lonely and really couldn't find a mod that helps it like I imagned this is still a wip and will be updated when time allows. im open to suggestions.

features include: working catapults
towers with fires

future updates: switches to control catapults
real gates
watch guards
weapon house

REQUIRES: SKYRIM.ESM
UPDATE.ESM
DAWNGUARD.ESM

DOESNT HURT WITH USE OF OTHER MODS OR MAIN VANILLA QUESTS THAT IM AWARE OF
author: Lordnutcase69
